nodes.text: This pin-up of a Felucian was a decorative poster available in the galaxy during the Clone Wars. It depicted a female Felucian posing seductively in blueish underwear. The poster graced the walls of the back room of the Trueping's cantina, the Turtle Tanker and a building in Pons Ora.
This poster was painted by The Clone Wars concept artist Randy Bantog.
